meanings.definition: The time of life when one was young.
meanings.sent1: In my yores, I used to play with my friends every day after school.
meanings.sent2: Grandma often reminisces about the yores when she was a little girl.
meanings.sent3: During the yores, I thought I could fly if I jumped high enough!
meanings.sent4: The yores are like a treasure chest of memories waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The yores are a magical time filled with endless possibilities.

meanings.definition: The time of life when one was young.
meanings.sent1: Back in the yores, we used to catch fireflies in the evening.
meanings.sent2: The yores are often remembered as a carefree and joyful period.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could go back to the yores and relive those innocent days.
meanings.sent4: The yores are like a beautiful painting of childhood memories.
meanings.sent5: The yores hold a special place in everyone's heart.

meanings.definition: The time of life when one was young.
meanings.sent1: During the yores, I loved to climb trees and explore the woods.
meanings.sent2: The yores are a time of discovery and wonder for many people.
meanings.sent3: Looking back at the yores, I realize how much I've grown since then.
meanings.sent4: The yores are a chapter in the book of life that we all cherish.
meanings.sent5: The yores shape who we become as adults.
